title: Brazil Partnering Award: Influence of gut microbiota derived short chain fatty acids on intestinal immunity
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText:
Award just started November 2014. A workshop partially financed by the award will take place in Sao Paulo, Brazil end of November 2014. The title of this workshop is:
"Nature versus Nurture: the Influence of Genes, Nutrition and the Microbiome on Immunity and Metabolism".  Cultural,Societal,Economic,Policy & public services
